original_title: The Macho Man Randy Savage & Elizabeth
overview: This Home Video Classic celebrates WWE's original power couple with a memorable look at "The Macho Man" Randy Savage and Miss Elizabeth. Witness Elizabeth by Savage's side during these battles against the likes of Hulk Hogan, George 'The Animal' Steele, and many more!
tagline: Get an exclusive look at the out-of-the-ring Macho lifestyle!
title: The Macho Man Randy Savage & Elizabeth
